daily_analysis.reasoning: Broader daily context (30+ candles) shows a clear rally from the lows (~140 area) into the 152 level with higher highs and higher lows → uptrend. I examined the rightmost 20–30 candles for a recent bullish engulfing at a nearby support zone and did not find a clear wick-to-wick bullish engulfing pattern close to the current price. Because there is no valid recent bullish engulfing pattern near current price, do not enter; wait for a valid bullish engulfing at a nearby support (or a clear pullback into a defined support zone) before taking a buy.

m30_analysis.reasoning: After a sharp sell-off there is a clear bullish engulfing (a large green candle that largely covers the prior red candle including wicks). I marked the wick-to-wick box around that candle pair. No Daily zone was provided, so the zone is not inside a daily zone.
